summary: Frontend testing completed for drag-and-drop gallery reordering and ToastTab Order Online URLs. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: GripVertical drag handle icons visible on each gallery item
Drag instruction message shown when multiple gallery items exist
Order Online buttons correctly use location.onlineOrdering URL with window.open
All 8 locations have ToastTab URLs configured in mockData.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Drag-and-drop gallery reordering and ToastTab Order Online URLs are working. Gallery tab shows drag handles on items when multiple items exist. Order Online button on location detail pages opens the correct ToastTab URL.

admin_gallery_drag_handles.details: GripVertical drag handle icons visible on each gallery item (top right corner)

drag_and_drop_instructions.details: Message 'Drag images to reorder. Changes are saved automatically.' appears when multiple items exist

edgewood_order_online.details: Order Online button opens correct ToastTab URL in new tab

midtown_order_online.details: Order Online button opens correct ToastTab URL in new tab

douglasville_order_online.details: Order Online button opens correct ToastTab URL in new tab
